name: Bookmarks Toolbar Fx4 Blue/Folders, Red/Bookmarks
description: Bookmark folders shown without icons in BLUE, and any bookmark not in a folder would be considered special and would be shown without icons in RED. The idea here is to use minimum real estate for Bookmarks Toolbar, so folders are used almost exclusively, and try to keep the folder names to 1-4 characters.  I know what my folders are so they don't need long names. This is for Firefox 4 thru Firefox 28. The Firefox 29 version is style 101569 (101569). The Firefox 3.6 version can be found in style 9091 (9091)
